com.shc.ahttp.client.messageconverter

Class JacksonMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shc.ahttp.client.messageconverter.JacksonMessageConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageConverter

    public class JacksonMessageConverter
extends Object
implements MessageConverter
    A Jackson based message converter which utilizes the ObjectMapper API to deserialize and serialize objects to and from JSON strings
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    vishalk2
